name: Sheetrock Joint Compound Dust Control Compound 1 qt.
short_description: Made in United States
product_description: Lightweight all-purpose joint compound with dust control is a ready-mixed compound with a patented formula that binds up fine residue during sanding to form heavier particles that tend to fall to the floor instead of clouding the air. Weighs up to 35% less than conventional compounds so handling, application, and sanding are simple, easy, and fast. Requires only 2 coats over metal, such as corner beads and fasteners. It bonds like a taping product for a tough, tight bond under most job conditions and combines all-purpose, single-package convenience with optimum taping and topping performance. Lightweight all-purpose joint compound with dust control can take on sheen or appear glossy after sanding. The surface will require priming with Sheetrock First Coat primer USG to equalize the sheen and porosity of the area covered with joint compound and the wallboard surface. Failure to follow this procedure can result in gloss differences in the finish paint over the joint compound, known as banding. Protect from freezing. WARNING: This product can expose you to chemicals including respirable crystalline silica which is known to the State of California to cause cancer. For more information go to www.P65Warnings.ca.gov. -

name: 384210060 18Lb Bag Easy Sand 45 Min Joint Compound Powder
short_description: Controlled Setting: The Easy Sand 45 Min Joint Compound is formulated for a 45-minute set time, allowing for controlled and efficient drywall joint finishing.
18 lb Bag: With a generous 18 lb supply, this joint compound provides ample material for various drywall projects, ensuring consistent and efficient coverage.
Versatile Use: Suitable for both professionals and DIYers, this joint compound is ideal for taping, finishing, and repairing drywall joints.
Efficient Coverage: The compound is engineered to offer efficient coverage, promoting smooth and durable finishes on a variety of drywall surfaces.

Professional-Grade Quality: USG is a trusted name in drywall solutions, and the Easy Sand 45 Min Joint Compound Powder maintains this reputation by delivering professional-grade quality for your projects.
product_description: Introducing the USG 384210060 18 lb Bag Easy Sand 45 Min Joint Compound Powder – Your Efficient Solution for Controlled Setting and Exceptional Drywall Joint Finishing! Enhance your drywall finishing projects with the USG Easy Sand 45 Min Joint Compound Powder. This 18 lb bag of joint compound is designed for a 45-minute set time, providing a balance between workability and efficient finishing, making it an ideal choice for professionals and DIY enthusiasts alike.

name: USG Sheetrock 384214060 18 Lb Bag Easy Sand 20 Min Joint, Light-Weight Setting Type Compound Powder
short_description: Quick Setting: The Easy Sand 20 Min Joint Compound is formulated for rapid setting, allowing you to move swiftly through the drywall finishing process.
Light-Weight Formula: The light-weight composition makes application and handling easier, reducing fatigue during extended use.
Versatile Use: Suitable for both professionals and DIYers, this joint compound is ideal for taping, finishing, and repairing drywall joints.
Efficient Coverage: With an 18 lb bag, you have an ample supply for various drywall projects, ensuring consistent and efficient coverage.
Durable Finish: The compound is engineered to create durable and smooth finishes, promoting the longevity and aesthetic appeal of your drywall surfaces.
20-Minute Working Time: Enjoy a reasonable window of 20 minutes for working with the compound, allowing you to achieve precise results without unnecessary haste.
product_description: Chemically setting powder compound for drywall interiors and exteriors that permit same-day joint finishing and, usually, next-day decoration. Compounds are lightweight for easy handling and sand easily for fast, smooth finishing. They are ideal for heavy fills and are virtually unaffected by humidity. They provide low shrinkage and superior bond, which makes them excellent for laminating gypsum panels to gypsum panels, to sound-deadening boards, and to above-grade concrete surfaces.

product_description: Sheetrock, 3. 5 Qt Pail, dust control, lightweight, all purpose joint compound, formulated to reduce airborne sanding dust, binds fine residue during sanding to form heavier particles that drop to the floor instead of clouding the air, a cleaner job environment, weighs 30 percent less than conventional compounds & requires only 2 coats over metal, such as paper faced corner beads & fasteners, Sands with the ease of a topping compound & bonds like a taping product, delivering a tough, tight bond under most demanding job conditions.
